structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Exercise of powers declared public function -- Property held for public purpose.
law.text: The exercise of any power granted to a riverport authority in KRS 65.510 to 65.650 is hereby declared to be a public function, exercised for a public purpose, and as a matter of public necessity, and any real or personal property, or rights therein, acquired by a riverport authority and used in the manner and for the purposes enumerated in KRS 65.510 to 65.650 is hereby declared to be acquired and used for public purposes and as a matter of public necessity.
law.history: Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 10. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 9.
